page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF EMMA
page.content: A normal school day for me starts at about 8am when I reluctantly climb out of bed. I clean my teeth and put on my school uniform then I have my breakfast, which is usualy cornflakes,toast,fruit juice and a cup of tea. At 9o'clock I go outside to catch the bus, for Alves Primary School.Once I'm there I usualy do maths and English up untill lunch time at 12.30pm. After lunch I play in the playground till the bell rings at 1.30pm.Then I do my project till 3.30pm I then go home in the minibus and get changed into my playing clothes.Early most evenings I attend a club for such things as badminton, gymnastics, brownies, and swimming.
